item.title: 新加坡应用程序引导的汽车共享缓解了飙升的成本
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，贝尼西亚-谭（Benicia Tan）将讨论她的家乡城市独特的昂贵的汽车拥有量，以及人们在应用程序的帮助下开辟的另一条道路。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Benicia Tan addresses her home city’s uniquely expensive car ownership and the alternative paths that people have charted with the help of apps.】

item.title: 欧盟官员前往中国和日本 期待喜忧参半的结果
item.description: 欧洲领导人本周将访问日本和中国领导人，预期结果反映出从战争到关税等各种力量正在重新划分全球贸易关系。【原文：European leaders will visit their Japanese and Chinese counterparts this week, and the expected outcomes reflect forces ranging from war to tariffs that are redrawing global trade relationships.】

item.title: 美联储的 "MAGA 货币政策鸡尾酒 "崭露头角
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们要讨论的是美联储政策工具帮助主街与帮助华尔街的论点。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at an argument for Fed policy tools helping Main Street versus Wall Street. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Stripe、SpaceX 投资方 Glade Brook 为新基金融资 5.15 亿美元
item.description: Glade Brook Capital Partners —；一家参股 SpaceX、Perplexity 和其他初创企业的投资公司 —；已从投资者处为其第四期基金募集到 5.15 亿美元。【原文：Glade Brook Capital Partners — an investment firm with stakes in SpaceX, Perplexity and other startups — has raised $515 million from investors for its fourth fund.】

item.title: 雪花、英伟达支持新独角兽 Reka AI，交易金额达 1.1 亿美元
item.description:
雪花公司此前一直在洽谈收购这家成立三年之久的人工智能初创公司。【原文：

Snowflake had previously been in talks to buy the three-year-old AI startup.

】

item.title: Paytm 实现盈利，创始人扭亏为盈
item.description: 随着销售额的增长和成本的下降，Paytm 公布了罕见的利润，这标志着这家金融科技公司在一年多前印度银行监管机构的限制措施对其大部分业务造成损害后正在反弹。【原文：Paytm reported a rare profit as sales grew and costs fell, signaling the fintech firm is bouncing back after the Indian banking regulator’s curbs more than a year ago hurt much of its business.】

item.title: 数十亿美元的天然气财富希望助推莫桑比克债券发行
item.description: 自 4 月份以来，莫桑比克的债券收益率是新兴市场平均收益率的三倍，这主要得益于这个饱受冲突困扰的国家计划重启一个价值数十亿美元的天然气项目。【原文：Mozambique’s bonds have generated three times the average return from emerging markets since April, boosted by the conflict-rattled nation’s plan to revive a multibillion-dollar gas project.】

item.title: 马里法院驳回释放四名巴里克员工的上诉
item.description: 马里一家法院驳回了要求有条件释放自 11 月以来被拘留的四名巴里克矿业公司员工的上诉。【原文：A court in Mali rejected an appeal for the conditional release of four Barrick Mining Corp. employees detained since November.】

item.title: 华尔街准备再次反对美国收紧资本规则
item.description: 华尔街贷款机构及其游说者周二来到美联储首次举行的银行业会议，向新任负责监管的副主席提出了一个广泛的要求：避免更严格的资本要求。【原文：Wall Street lenders and their lobbyists are descending on the Federal Reserve’s first-of-its kind banking conference Tuesday with a broad ask of the new vice chair for supervision: steer clear of stricter capital requirements.】

item.title: 甲骨文将为 OpenAI 数据中心提供 200 万个人工智能芯片
item.description: OpenAI和甲骨文公司宣布将扩大合作，开发4.5千兆瓦的额外美国数据中心容量，进一步推进为人工智能工作负载提供动力的大规模计划。【原文：OpenAI and Oracle Corp. announced they will develop 4.5 gigawatts of additional US data center capacity in an expanded partnership, furthering a massive plan to power artificial intelligence workloads.】

item.title: 印度航空公司寻求约 2 亿美元贷款用于购买飞机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度航空公司正在寻求约 2 亿美元的银行贷款，以便从一家美国飞机租赁公司购买一批波音 777 飞机。【原文：Air India is seeking a bank loan of about $200 million to purchase a fleet of Boeing 777 planes from a US-based aircraft leasing company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法官称 HPE 收购迈克-林奇的 Autonomy 后损失 7.3 亿英镑
item.description: 惠普企业公司收购迈克-林奇的 Autonomy 公司后损失了约 7.3 亿英镑（9.85 亿美元），伦敦法官在这位英国科技大亨游艇在西西里岛海岸风暴中沉没溺水身亡不到一年后作出了这一判决。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. lost around £730 million ($985 million) after it bought Mike Lynch’s firm Autonomy Corp., a London judge ruled less than a year after the British tech tycoon drowned when his yacht sank in a storm off the coast of Sicily.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔将发表讲话，国债承压下滑
item.description: 在美国政府向美联储主席鲍威尔施加越来越大的下台压力之际，投资者关注美联储主席鲍威尔周二晚些时候的讲话，国债有望结束连续四天的涨势。【原文：Treasuries were on course to snap a four-day rally as investors look to a speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell later Tuesday amid mounting pressure on him from the US administration to step down.】

item.title: 六个月过去了，特朗普的大多数交易终于有了回报
item.description:
股票和比特币创下历史新高，大多数债券收益率走低

。【原文：

Stocks and Bitcoin are at records, and most bond yields are lower

】

item.title: 华尔街顽固看好低迷的能源股
item.description: 华尔街分析师对石油和天然气类股票寄予厚望，因为估值便宜，而且唐纳德-特朗普总统对陷入困境的能源行业大加鼓励。【原文：Wall Street analysts have high hopes for oil and gas stocks, encouraged by cheap valuations and President Donald Trump’s boosterism of the beleaguered energy sector.】

item.title: 日本热播动画片《恶魔猎人》续集打破自身票房纪录
item.description: 日本大热动画片《恶魔猎手》系列打破了自己的首周末票房纪录，随着周五第二部电影的上映，票房收入超过 55 亿日元（3,700 万美元）。【原文：The Japanese smash-hit anime series Demon Slayer has shattered its own opening weekend box-office record, raking in over ¥5.5 billion ($37 million) with the release of a second movie on Friday.】

item.title: 中国开展检查以制止煤炭生产过剩
item.description: 中国政府警告说，它可能会关闭产量超过许可水平的煤矿，这是监管机构开始认真控制各行业产能过剩的最新迹象。【原文：The Chinese government warned it may shutter coal mines guilty of producing above permitted levels, in the latest sign that regulators are getting serious about reining in overcapacity across industries.】

item.title: 指控俄罗斯干预的前议员在欧洲人权法院败诉
item.description: 欧洲最高人权法院驳回了三名前立法者提出的法律挑战，裁定英国政府没有因未能调查俄罗斯干预选举的指控而侵犯选民的权利。【原文：The UK government didn’t breach voters’ rights by failing to investigate alleged Russian interference in elections, Europe’s top human rights court ruled, rejecting a legal challenge brought by three former lawmakers.】

item.title: 中国顶级医疗器械制造商明德医疗据称酝酿在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的医疗器械生产商深圳明德生物医疗电子股份有限公司（Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics Co.【原文：Shenzhen Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics Co., China’s biggest maker of medical devices, is considering a second listing in Hong Kong that could raise at least $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度必须警惕低价钢铁倾销，JSW 称
item.description: 印度最大的金属生产商之一 JSW 钢铁有限公司的联合总经理 Jayant Acharya 表示，印度需要警惕廉价进口钢材可能涌入该国。【原文：India needs to be vigilant against cheap imports of steel that may flood the country, according to Jayant Acharya, joint managing director of JSW Steel Ltd., one of the country’s biggest producers of the metal.】

item.title: 泰国表示即将与美国达成降低 36% 出口关税的协议
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，泰国即将与美国达成协议，在8月1日的最后期限之前降低美国威胁对泰国出口征收的36%的关税，他预计贸易谈判将在几天内结束。【原文：Thailand is close to an agreement with the US to lower a threatened 36% tariff on its exports ahead of the Aug. 1 deadline, according to Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira, who expects trade talks to conclude within days.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行竞购 BPM 银行接近尾声，截止日期为周三
item.description: 在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购 Banco BPM SpA 八个月后，Andrea Orcel 的时间不多了。【原文：Eight months after UniCredit SpA made its move on Banco BPM SpA, time is running out for Andrea Orcel.】

item.title: 中国投资者抢购香港股市，资金流入接近创纪录水平
item.description: 中国内地投资者购买香港上市股票的数量正接近创纪录的年度水平，推动了香港股市的上涨，使香港的一个重要基准成为全球表现最好的股票之一。【原文：Mainland Chinese investors’ purchase of Hong Kong-listed stocks is approaching an annual record, driving a rally that has made a key benchmark in the city one of the world’s best performers.】

item.title: 为什么 "反胁迫 "工具是欧盟不得已而为之的贸易武器？
item.description: 欧盟在贸易争端中拥有一个强大的工具，但它希望永远不需要使用这个工具。【原文：The European Union has a powerful tool to wield in trade disputes that it hopes it will never need to use.】

item.title: 西班牙停电事故可能导致最大电力用户雷普索尔公司损失 1.7 亿欧元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，西班牙的停电事故可能导致石油生产商雷普索尔公司（Repsol SA）的炼油厂和化工厂在上个季度蒙受了约 1.7 亿欧元（约合 2 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Spain’s power outages probably cost oil producer Repsol SA about €170 million ($200 million) in losses at refineries and chemical plants last quarter, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 停电导致西班牙上半年天然气用量猛增 41
item.description: 今年上半年，西班牙用于发电的天然气消耗量飙升了 41%，在 4 月份全国大停电之后，电网严重依赖化石燃料来稳定国家的电力网络。【原文：Spain’s gas consumption for electricity generation soared 41% in the first half of the year, with the power grid relying heavily on the fossil fuel to stabilize the country’s power network in the wake of a nationwide blackout in April.】

item.title: 期权发出信号：美元强势正在消退，风险正在积聚
item.description: 货币期权市场发出信号，美元将再次承压，而进入八月后，一波风险浪潮可能会对美元造成压力。【原文：Currency options markets are signaling the dollar will come under renewed pressure, just as a wave of risks threatens to weigh on the greenback heading into August.】

item.title: 英国购物者因食品价格上涨面临额外 275 英镑的杂货账单
item.description: 截至 7 月中旬的四周内，英国食品通胀率略有上升，因为购物者在结账时开始感受到更大的食品账单负担。【原文：UK food inflation nudged higher in the four weeks to mid-July as shoppers start to feel the burden of bigger grocery bills at the checkout.】

item.title: 交易商关注需求，欧洲天然气在连续三天下跌后趋于平稳
item.description: 欧洲天然气在连续三天下滑后得到喘息，交易商对全球各地的需求洼地进行了评估，这些洼地可能对欧洲大陆储备燃料的努力构成挑战。【原文：European natural gas took a breather after a three-day slide, with traders assessing demand pockets across the globe that could challenge the continent’s efforts to stockpile the fuel.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯拉瓦比公司聘请 Alvarez & Marsal 公司进行战略审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的拉瓦比控股公司（Rawabi Holding）是一家规模庞大的企业集团，业务涉及能源、工业服务和房地产等领域，该公司正与 Alvarez & Marsal 公司合作进行战略审查。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Rawabi Holding, a sprawling conglomerate with interests spanning energy, industrial services and real estate, is working with Alvarez & Marsal on a strategic review, according to people familiar with the matter.】
